trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 13th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsAt the time, I was inside my house...I heard a helicopter flying about...Istepped outside to see it and I saw it flying around the UFO. So i ran insideand got my camera and began to tape. At first I tought it might be a silverballoon. But once it hovered to the east emitting white lites I knew it had tobe foreign. So I videotaped the whole event of the helicopter flying around itas it hovered slowly to the east and disapeared behind trees. The Object at alltimes seemed to be changing, looked like a silver saucer shaped ball that keptchanging form and has several white lites on the bottom. Amazingly I remainedcalm throught out the event and was able to get very good footage of this UFO.Im happy to say the tape speaks for itself.
Summary: I saw and Videotaped a silver saucer shaped UFO. V
